name: Shell-Bot
description: Telegram bot for executing shell commands

BOT_TOKEN.description: Get your bot token by talking to @Botfather

RCLONE_CONFIG_BASE64.description: Your Rclone config encoded using Base64

CREDENTIALS_LINK.description: enter permanent download link(maybe from index) of your credentials.json

ACCOUNTS_FOLDER_LINK.description: enter permanent download link(maybe from index) of your accounts.zip

LANG.description: Setting the encoding to UTF-8 Dont touch this
